name: Skycommand
description:
Welcome, Young Pilot! Today you'll be shooting down enemy drones created by Dr. Alfaro. Your task is simple, destroy the enemy drones, than destroy the drone factory. Good Luck, Young Pilot...

Current Game Elements:

  • Shooting Enemy Drones
  • Score System
  • Plane Lives

More updates will come eventually
